
```{r}
filter(surveys, year == 1995)
```

## Challenge
```{r}
surveys %>%
  filter(year < 1995) %>% 
  select(year, sex, weight)
```

```{r}
surveys %>%
  mutate(weight_kg = weight / 1000,
         weight_lb = weight_kg * 2.2)
```

```{r}
surveys %>%
  filter(!is.na(weight)) %>%
  mutate(weight_kg = weight / 1000) %>%
  head()
```

## Challenge
```{r}
surveys_metric_hindfoot <- surveys %>% 
  filter(!is.na(hindfoot_length)) %>%
  mutate(hindfoot_cm = hindfoot_length / 10) %>%
  filter(hindfoot_cm < 3) %>%
  select(species_id, hindfoot_cm)
head(surveys_metric_hindfoot)
```

```{r}
surveys %>%
  filter(!is.na(weight)) %>%
  group_by(sex, species_id) %>%
  summarize(mean_weight = mean(weight)) %>% 
  print(n = 15)
```

```{r}
surveys %>%
  count(sex, species) %>%
  arrange(species, desc(n))
```

## Challenge
1.
```{r}
surveys %>% 
  count(plot_type)
```

2.
```{r}
surveys %>%
    filter(!is.na(hindfoot_length)) %>%
    group_by(species_id) %>%
    summarize(
        mean_hf_length = mean(hindfoot_length),
        min_hf_length = min(hindfoot_length),
        max_hf_length = max(hindfoot_length),
        n = n()
    )
```

3. 
```{r}
surveys %>%
    filter(!is.na(weight)) %>%
    group_by(year) %>%
    filter(weight == max(weight)) %>%
    select(weight, genus, species_id, year)
```
